content:
I apologize for any confusion, but I'm not actually using a language exchange app. I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences or use apps. I'm here to provide information and assist with your questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'm happy to help you explore different language exchange apps and platforms that might suit your needs. There are many options available, and the best one for you would depend on your language goals, availability, and personal preferences.

If you're interested, I can provide more information on the apps I mentioned earlier, such as Tandem, HelloTalk, or italki, or we can explore other options together. Just let me know!
